meanings.definition: To design (something) jointly with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I codesigned a birthday card for our teacher.
meanings.sent2: The architects codesigned the new building to ensure it met all safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The two artists codesigned a mural that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration codesigned a masterpiece that left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: Working together, they codesigned a beautiful garden that bloomed with colors.

meanings.definition: Jointly design (something) with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: The students codesigned a poster for the school event.
meanings.sent2: The team codesigned a new logo for the company.
meanings.sent3: The chefs codesigned a dish that tasted like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership codesigned a solution that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: Together, they codesigned a playground that echoed with laughter.
